<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/ipdbdatastream">IPDBDataStream</a> defines an interface used to represent a stream consisting of a name and a series of records whose formats depend on the particular stream type. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/ipdbdatastream/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>
